item.description: Show your support for the separation of church and state at the next Cranston School Committee meeting. Bring signs, bring cameras, bring friends and families. Let's take a stand for what's right, and stand up for Jessica Ahlquist. Last time we had nearly 100 people come out. This time we can double that easy. _ _ See a video with Ellery Schempp and Jessica Ahlquist speaking at the last school committee meeting, at http://news.providencejournal.com/breaking-news/2012/01/two-sides-face.html. _ _ PS: If you're coming from Boston, but don't want to drive, I can tell you that there is a commuter train leaving from South Station at 4:35, which will arrive in Providence at 5:42. There are cabs right at the terminal that can take you to the meeting, a distance of about seven miles. _ _ If you encounter any trouble or get lost, call me at 617-935-4951.
item.name: Support the Constitution at the Cranston School Committee Meeting
